trans-unit.source: The GlobalCatalog class represents a global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: GlobalCatalog 类表示的全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: A global catalog server is a domain controller that hosts a replica of the global catalog.
trans-unit.target: 全局编录服务器是承载副本的全局编录域控制器。

trans-unit.source: Demotes this domain controller from a global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: 将从全局目录服务器此域控制器降级。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"></xref> object that represents the domain controller.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> </xref>表示的域控制器的对象。

trans-unit.source: The domain controller is not a global catalog server or the global catalog server has already been disabled.
trans-unit.target: 域控制器不是全局编录服务器或全局编录服务器已禁用。

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放当前对象。

trans-unit.source: Not supported for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"></xref> class because this domain controller is already a global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: 不支持<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"></xref>类，因为此域控制器已为全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: Not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 不适用。

trans-unit.source: This method will always throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将始终引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>异常。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The domain controller is already a global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: 域控制器已全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放当前对象。

trans-unit.source: Finds all global catalog servers in the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的上下文中查找所有全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>对象，其中包含的目标和凭据用于进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: The target of the context must be a forest.
trans-unit.target: 此上下文的目标必须是林。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection"></xref> object that contains the global catalog servers found by the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection"> </xref>对象，其中包含由搜索找到的全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: context is not valid.
trans-unit.target: context不是有效的。

trans-unit.source: context is .
trans-unit.target: contextis .

trans-unit.source: Finds all global catalog servers in the specified context and site.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的上下文和站点中查找所有全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>对象，其中包含的目标和凭据用于进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: The target of the context must be a forest.
trans-unit.target: 此上下文的目标必须是林。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site to search for global catalog servers.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的全局编录服务器的站点名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection"></xref> object that contains the global catalog servers found by the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection"> </xref>对象，其中包含由搜索找到的全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: context or siteName is not valid.
trans-unit.target: context或siteName无效。

trans-unit.source: context or siteName is .
trans-unit.target: contextor siteName is .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all of the Active Directory Domain Services properties that are stored on this global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: 检索所有存储在此全局编录服务器的 Active Directory 域服务属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> object that contains the Active Directory Domain Services properties that are stored on this global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> </xref>包含存储在此全局编录服务器的 Active Directory 域服务属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The domain controller is not a global catalog server or the global catalog server has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: 域控制器不是全局编录服务器或全局编录服务器已被禁用。

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放当前对象。

trans-unit.source: Finds a single global catalog server in the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的上下文中查找单个全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>对象，其中包含的目标和凭据用于进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"></xref> object that represents the global catalog server found by the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"> </xref>表示搜索所找到的全局编录服务器的对象。

trans-unit.source: No global catalog server was found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: context is not valid.
trans-unit.target: context不是有效的。

trans-unit.source: context is .
trans-unit.target: contextis .

trans-unit.source: Finds a single global catalog server in the specified context, allowing for additional search options.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的上下文中，允许其他搜索选项查找单个全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>对象，其中包含的目标和凭据用于进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: A combination of one or more of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions"></xref> members that defines the type of global catalog server to find.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个组合<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions"></xref>定义的全局编录服务器，以找到的类型的成员。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"></xref> object that represents the global catalog server found by the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"> </xref>表示搜索所找到的全局编录服务器的对象。

trans-unit.source: No global catalog server was found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: context or flag is not valid.
trans-unit.target: context或flag无效。

trans-unit.source: context is null.
trans-unit.target: context为 null。

trans-unit.source: Finds a single global catalog server in the specified context and site.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的上下文和站点中查找单个全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>对象，其中包含的目标和凭据用于进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site to search for a global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索全局编录服务器的站点名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"></xref> object that represents the global catalog server found by the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"> </xref>表示搜索所找到的全局编录服务器的对象。

trans-unit.source: No global catalog server was found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: context or siteName is not valid.
trans-unit.target: context或siteName无效。

trans-unit.source: context or siteName is .
trans-unit.target: contextor siteName is .

trans-unit.source: Finds a single global catalog server in the specified context and site, allowing for additional search options.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用其他搜索选项中指定的上下文和站点，查找单个全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>对象，其中包含的目标和凭据用于进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site to search for a global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索全局编录服务器的站点名称。

trans-unit.source: A combination of one or more of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions"></xref> members that defines the type of global catalog server to find.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个组合<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions"></xref>定义的全局编录服务器，以找到的类型的成员。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"></xref> object that represents the global catalog server found by the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"> </xref>表示搜索所找到的全局编录服务器的对象。

trans-unit.source: No global catalog server was found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: context, siteName, or flag is not valid.
trans-unit.target: contextsiteName，或flag无效。

trans-unit.source: context or siteName is null.
trans-unit.target: context或siteName为 null。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> object for the global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: 检索<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref>的全局编录服务器对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> object for the global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"> </xref>的全局编录服务器对象。

trans-unit.source: The global catalog server has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: 全局编录服务器已被禁用。

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放当前对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"></xref> object for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 检索<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"></xref>指定上下文的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref>包含目标和凭据以用来检索对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: The target of the context must be a domain controller.
trans-unit.target: 此上下文的目标必须是域控制器。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"></xref> object that represents the global catalog server that was found.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"> </xref>对象，表示未找到全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the target specified in context could not be made.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的目标的连接 context 无法建立。

trans-unit.source: context is .
trans-unit.target: contextis .

trans-unit.source: context is not valid.
trans-unit.target: context不是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Determines if this domain controller is a global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: 确定此域控制器是否为全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this domain controller is a global catalog server; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is not a global catalog server.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此域控制器是全局编录服务器;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果它不是全局编录服务器。

trans-unit.source: The global catalog server has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: 全局编录服务器已被禁用。

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放当前对象。
